Text: You have no idea how incredibly grateful I am for you putting this up.  This was something I grew up with and was obsessed with watching from my childhood, and I was sooooooo upset my mother taped over it.  now here I am 22 and suddenly I have found it again.  This will bring back alot of things when I'm done downloading it, I can't thank you enough.

I completely identify with the above !
I am also 22 just randomly thought to google it and this is the only place on the net I could find it.
Thank you !!!
